ModMetaData.name: ArmourRepair
ModMetaData.author: Skullywag
ModMetaData.description: Adds the ability to "repair" power armour and shields at the machining workbench. Repairing is actually crafting a new set of armour using armour/shield as an ingredient, so itll reroll the quality based on skill, costs quite a lot plasteel/uranium though.
